column1: I'd like to book a trip to Atlantis from Caprica on Saturday, August 13, 2016 for 8 adults. I have a tight budget of 1700.?
column2: Hi...I checked a few options for you, and unfortunately, we do not currently have any trips that meet this criteria.  Would you like to book an alternate travel option?

column1: Yes, how about going to Neverland from Caprica on August 13, 2016 for 5 adults. For this trip, my budget would be 1900.?
column2: I checked the availability for this date and there were no trips available.  Would you like to select some alternate dates?

column1: I have no flexibility for dates... but I can leave from Atlantis rather than Caprica. How about that??
column2: I checked the availability for that date and there were no trips available.  Would you like to select some alternate dates?

column1: Hello, I am looking to book a vacation from Gotham City to Mos Eisley for $2100.?
column2: Hi. Sorry, I can't find any trips from Gotham City to Mos Eisley for you.

column1: What about a trip from Gotham City to Neverland for the same budget??
column2: Sorry, I cannot find any trips leaving from Gotham City. Could you suggest another nearby departure city?

column1: Would any packages to Mos Eisley be available if I increase my budget to $2500??
column2: There are no trips available to Mos Eisley.

column1: You know what, I'd like to try and visit Neverland?
column2: I cannot find any trips available to Neverland.

column1: Do you have any trips from Gotham City to Kobe for my original budget of $2100??
column2: I can book you a 3 day trip to Kobe leaving from Sapporo, Japan. Is this ok?

column1: No, that's too far for me. I need a flight that leaves from Birmingham.?
column2: I can book you a trip from Birmingham to Kobe for 2747.8 USD.

column1: How many days would I be in Kobe??
column2: You would arrive in Kobe August 17th and return to Birmingham on August 22nd.

column1: What would the price be if I shortened my trip by one day??
column2: I can not find any trips from Birmingham to Kobe for 4 days.

column1: Ok, then I would like to purchase this package. What activities are included in this package??
column2: There are no activities listed for this package. You will be staying at the Ivory Legacy Hotel for 7 days. This hotel has a 4.5 star rating and free wifi. Will I go ahead and book this package?

column1: Yes, I would like to book this package.?
column2: Great. Your flight departs from Birmingham at 9:00 am - Wednesday, August 17th 2016. Enjoy your trip, I have booked this package for you.

column1: Hello there i am looking to go on a vacation with my family to Gotham City, can you help me??
column2: when  would you like to travel and how many people will you be?

column1: Not sure when we want to leave, but we are 12 kids and 5 adults?
column2: do you have a budget?

column1: yes i do, it is around $2200?
column2: where will you be travelling from?

column1: We are from Neverland?
column2: We have nothing available leaving from Neverland, are you able to depart from another city?

column1: we can depart from Toronto?
column2: Gotham City is not a destination we travel to. Are you interested in any other destinations?

column1: hmm what options would i have out of Toronto??
column2: Would you be interested in Calgary?

column1: that would be nice?
column2: I have a departure from Toronto to Calgary  on August 17 returning on August 24. Does that work for you?

column1: No sorry i was planning on getting a tan this vacation. Thanks, is there anywhere else? Thank you
is there anywhere else??
column2: How about a trip to Dominican Republic? it is quite cheap at this time of year.

column1: What options do you have available for me??
column2: I have the el Mar hotel available in Punta Cana this week.

column1: That sounds interesting. how many stars does the hotel have??
column2: 2.5 stars. You would have to fly out of Melbourne though

column1: Hi I'd like to go to Caprica from Busan, between Sunday August 21, 2016 and Wednesday August 31, 2016?
column2: And what would be your maximum budget for this trip?

column1: Actually it's unlimited for this trip?
column2: How many adults and how many children will be making this trip?

column1: 2 adults?
column2: I have no trips to Caprica from Busan.  I do have a trip to Mannheim, Germany, one to Kingston , Canada, and another to Toronto Canada.  Would you like to select alternate dates or an alternate travel destination?

column1: Do you have anything for San Antonio as a destination??
column2: Yes, I do.  I have one for 8445.37 USD.  Would you like to book this package?  The guest rating is 7.15/10 and there is free parking and free wifi.  Leaving Sunday, August 21st at 11:00 a.m. and returning Sunday, August 28th at 1:00 a.m.

column1: Is breakfast included??
column2: Yes, it is.

column1: That sounds great. 1:00 am return on Sunday August 28th is very early in the morning... ?
column2: Would you like to book this package?

column1: Hello, I am looking to book a trip for 2 adults and 6 children for $21,300 or less. We are departing from Kochi for Denver.?
column2: I have several options available within your budget. How long would you like to travel for? And do you have dates in mind?

column1: I do not have any dates in mind. I would like to spend as much time in Denver as my budget will allow.?
column2: I can book 7 days at a 4.0 star hotel for 19028.93USD. I can also book 7 days at a 3.0 star hotel for 12824.84USD.

column1: Do these packages have different departure dates? When would I be leaving for each of them??
column2: The 3.0 star trip leaves Kochi August 26 and returns August 31. The 4.0 star leaves August 27 from Kochi and returns September 1.

column1: Ok, I would like to purchase the trip with the 4-star hotel.?
column2: Perfect, I will book that trip for you now. You will depart Kochi at 9:00 am August 27. Have a nice day.

column1: Hey, i Want to go to St. Louis on the 17th of August?
column2: For how many days?

column1: I need to back by the 31st?
column2: What will your departure city be?

column1: I am from Calgary?
column2: I have a direct flight leaving from Calgary on August 18 and returning on August 28th. Does that work for you?

column1: Yes that sounds perfect may you please tell me about the destination place?
column2: It is the Glorious Cloak inn hotel in St. Louis. It has a 3-star rating.

column1: That sounds lavish, what type of flight would that be??
column2: You would be flying business class, for a grand total of only $1858.14

column1: Are there any possible flights with economy class??
column2: I have a package at the Lunar whcih has a 5 star rating on an economy class flight on the same dates for $1558.00

column1: that sounds even better.?
column2: This deal includes free breakfast and free wifi. Would you like me to book it for you?

column1: I'm looking for a trip to Gotham City leaving from Kakariko Village on Saturday, August 13, 2016. 3 adults for no more than $2400 USD.?
column2: I have a trip available to Vancouver for these dates within your price range.  Would you like to increase your budget or adjust the dates?

column1: I'd like to adjust the departure city to Caprica.?
column2: Still no availability for this destination.  Would you like to increase your budget or adjust the dates?

column1: The dates cannot be changed. How about going to Theed with 14 adults, leaving from Kakariko Village, on a budget of $2900??
column2: Still no availability.

column1: Hello, I would like to book a 2-week trip leaving from Melbourne on August 27. I would like to go to Mannheim.?
column2: Have you got a budget for this vacation?

column1: I do not have a budget, however I would like to pick whichever package is cheapest. Could you offer me the cheapest package for each destination??
column2: I can book you 9 days in Mannheim for 3258.15USD at a 5 star hotel,

column1: Is there a package to Mannheim which offers a cheaper hotel? I am flexible with my dates of arrival and departure.?
column2: I am unable to find any cheaper packages for Mannheim

column1: What would the cost be if I stayed for 10 days in Mexico City??
column2: You can stay in Mexico City for 8 days for 426.16USD leaving from Melbourne, USA.

column1: Actually I am leaving from Melbourne, Australia. How does this affect the price of the trip??
column2: I cannot find any trips available from Melbourne, Australia to Mexico City.

column1: Could I purchase a package  to Vancouver similar to the one I was offered??
column2: I cannot find any trips available from Melbourne, Australia to any destinations. This point of departure is not in my database.

column1: Hello, I am planning to book a trip to pittsborgh?
column2: Hello. Would that be Pittsborgh, Pennsylvania?

column1: i think so!?
column2: And what city will you be departing from?

column1: We will be leaving from Fukuoka?
column2: how many people will be travelling together?

column1: there will be myself, 1 adult, and my four kids?
column2: Do you have specific dates in mind?

column1: none at the moment?
column2: and for how long would you like to go for?

column1: also not sure yet?
column2: I have no flights available to Pittsburgh, but I have package available to Vancouver

column1: I would like to see the availabilities in Vancouver please?
column2: I have several available.  Do you have a budget in mind?

column1: I have $12600 to spend on this vacation?
column2: It would be helpful if you could provide me with some dates

column1: we are very flexible with dates anything would work?
column2: I am very sorry  but I have nothing available at the moment

column1: Hi, I need to go to Mos Eisley for a wedding, leaving on Saturday, August 13, 2016 and returning on Tuesday, August 16, 2016. Preferably for $3700.?
column2: Would you like to have a departure from a specific location?

column1: I'd like to get away from Monday, August 15, 2016 to Wednesday, August 31, 2016. My budget is $3200 and I would leave from Detroit.?
column2: And what destination would you like to travel to?

column1: Anywhere, I'm looking for an adventure. What do you have??
column2: How about Mexico or Porto Alegre?

column1: Let's look at both?
column2: Mexico is unavailable.  Porto Alegre is available, but you would have to leave from Santos.

column1: Can you please suggest some destinations that are available? I am leaving from Detroit.?
column2: I have no departures available from Detroit. for these dates.  Would you like to make a date change?

column1: Anything between August 15 and August 31??
column2: I'm sorry, but we do not have any departures from Detroit available for these dates for the budget you provided.  Would you like to adjust your budget for this trip?

column1: Good day, please book me a trip from Vancouver, Jamaica to Recife. I would like to leave for 17 days on August 24.?
column2: Would you like to travel to Vancouver, Canada from Dublin, USA?

column1: No, I would like to depart from Vancouver, Jamaica for the aforementioned destination.?
column2: I can book you an 8 day trip from Calgary to Vancouver, Canada for 810.50USD.

column1: I would not like to travel to Vancouver, Canada.  Do you have any trips to Recife, Brazil??
column2: I can book you a trip from Porto Alegre to Recife for 682.19USD.

column1: I will take any package you give me to any destination as long as it leaves from Vancouver, Jamaica.?
column2: I can book you a trip from Vancouver, Canada to Toronto, Canada for 837.99USD.

column1: If you cannot book me a flight that leaves from Vancouver, Jamaica then I cannot book a trip.?
column2: I cannot book you a trip leaving from Vancouver, Jamaica.

column1: Actually I will be departing from Vancouver, British Columbia, do you have packages to Recife??
column2: I can book 11 days in Recife leaving from Vancouver for 2171.6USD.

column1: Do you have any similar packages to Goiania??
column2: I can book 5 days in Goiania for 2190.68USD.

column1: What kind of hotel would I be staying at in Recife??
column2: 3.5 star hotel for free wi-fi, free parking, and free breakfast.

column1: Would my room have a view of the city? How much would it cost to upgrade to a room with a view??
column2: I cannot provide this information

column1: Ok, I'm ready to buy this package?
column2: Ok. I will book this package for you. You will be leaving Vancouver, Canada at 1:00 pm - Monday, August 15th 2016 and arriving in Recife, Brazil at 10:16 pm - Monday, August 15th 2016. You will be staying at La Casa Del Amor. Enjoy your trip.

column1: I was supposed to leave on August 24th. Do you have any packages that leave on that date??
column2: I can book you 11 days in Recife leaving Vancouver on August 27th for 3119.42USD.

column1: Actually I would like to purchase the first package to Recife.?
column2: Ok, I will book you the package to Recife that leaves Vancouver, Canada on August 15.

column1: Hi im looking for a nice destination that i could go to from Columbus?
column2: I have 2 choices, Vancouver or Toronto.

column1: What options are there for both?
column2: I have a few. Do you have a budget in mind?

column1: $3700 is my budget at the moment?
column2: I have the Obsidian Gem Inn in Vancouver which is a 4-star hotel at $1934.64 or the Hotel Richard in Toronto which is a 3-star hotel at $2393.00. Both are for a 14 day stay.

column1: Toronto seems like a better place this time of year, when would the flights be??
column2: I have a direct flight to Toronto departing on August 15th and returning on August 28th.  Would you like me to book that for you?

column1: would by chance have one leaving on the 19th?
column2: I have a flight available departing on August 24th and returning on September 6th

column1: let¡¯s go ahead and book this?
column2: Perfect. Thank you.

column1: Hi, I have a big family and we can't afford a big vacation, we want to go to Atlantis from Mos Eisley for $3600 at most.?

column1: Nope?
column2: And how many adults and how many children are you bringing with you to Atlantis?

column1: 12 adults and one child.?

column1: No, we are visiting family in Atlantis. Can you check once more please??
column2: I'm sorry, but I do not currently have any travel packages available for this location.  Are you quite sure that I cannot interest you in another travel destination?

column1: Hi, I'm leaving from Diagon Alley and going to Coruscant on a budget of $3400. The dates don't matter, but I cannot afford anything over my budget.?
column2: And how many children and adults will you be bringing with you?

column1: Just myself.?
column2: I'm sorry, but this travel destination is not available.

column1: What about Neverland on the same budget??
column2: Neverland is unavailable.  Vancouver would be available, however.  Would you like to select another location?

column1: No I cannot do another location. What if I increased my budget by $400??
column2: I am sorry, but we do not have any trips available to the Neverland travel destination.

column1: nor Coruscant??
column2: Coruscant is not available either.

column1: Hi there, im from Vitoria and I want to go on vacation?

column2: It is called the Rose Sierra Hotel and it is a 3-star hotel that includes free breakfast, wifi and parking. The total cost would be  $2170.90.

column2: It is an economy class flight

column1: Hi, me and my family want to take a trip to Kakariko Village.?
